title: Development, additions / alterations, repairs, restoration, in respect of graded heritage buildings or buildings in heritage precincts or heritage sites shall be in accordance with the provisions mentioned at 9 (C & D) of this regulation
clause_text: Development, additions / alterations, repairs, restoration, in respect of graded heritage buildings or buildings in heritage precincts or heritage sites shall be in accordance with the provisions mentioned at 9 (C & D) of this regulation.
